data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Chang-Ti, Melika, George, Yang, Man-Miao, Nicholls, James, Csóka, György, Stone, Graham N. (2009): First record of an Andricus oak gallwasp from the Oriental Region: a new species from Taiwan (Hymenoptera: Cynipidae: Cynipini). Zootaxa 2175: 57-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275097
